description: Update a customer incident default assignee
permissions: User must be allowed to update the related customer (CustomerPolicy update?).
side_effects: Updates attributes or relationships for a customer incident default assignee record.
validation_notes: At least one of --default-assignee or --kind must be provided. If provided, --default-assignee and --kind cannot be empty. kind must be a valid incident kind and is unique per customer. default-assignee must be an admin or have a membership with the customer or the customer broker. The customer relationship cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --default-assignee
flags.description: User ID for the default assignee
flags.validation: If provided, must be a valid user ID with a relationship to the customer (admin, customer member, or broker member).

flags.name: --kind
flags.validation: If provided, must be one of: equipment, plant, trucking, crew, safety, quality, weather, traffic, capacity, job_site_condition, planning, near_miss, property_damage, personal_injury, over_trucking, good_catch, damage, overloading, subcontractor_delay, mobilization, accident_notification_and_assistance, theft, vandalism, vehicle_incident, work_zone_intrusion.
